How do I contact the Verus Coin Foundation to learn more about their private blockchain development services?

The Verus Coin Foundation is not focused on private blockchain development services. Instead, they are working on public infrastructure applications, such as using public blockchains as a service, blockchain-based polls and voting, and more. If you're interested in learning more or getting involved, you can contact them at foundationrelease@veruscoin.io.

use pubic blockchains as a service, blockchain based polls and voting, and many more public infrastructure applications in the not too distant future.
The Verus Coin Foundation is looking for strong developers, designers, blockchain architects, business development people, community development and IT experts. To join this decentralized project and help with one of the functions above, contact a Verus project representative today.
Contact:

You can stay connected with the Verus Coin Foundation through their website, Twitter, Reddit, and Discord channel. You can try reaching out to one of the representatives on Discord, such as miketout, englal, michaeltoutjr, VirtualSoundNW, Asher, or crypto05.
